articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: WHO Declares Coronavirus Outbreak an International Emergency
articles.description: The World Health Organization called the outbreak of coronavirus in China a global health emergency, citing the risk that the sometimes-deadly virus could expand to other countries beyond the smattering of cases outside China so far. (Source: Bloomberg)
